nodes.text: Caretaker droid was a type of droid designed by Iokath species to tend to the artificial world of Iokath. The species went extinct following the Iokath civil war, and their caretaker droids were repurposed by ARIES into the combat units, aggressive to any intruders.
Caretaker droids appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as enemies on Iokath.
